fields.html:
SEO / Social

If the page content is a collection or has no SEO/Opengraph entries of its own, then these values will be used. It's best to set them here just to be safe.

fields.name: og_description
fields.label: Opengraph / Search Engine Description
fields.description: Description used for social sharing and SEO.

fields.name: seo_keywords
fields.label: SEO Keywords
fields.description: Keywords and phrases used for SEO - separate entries with a comma.

fields.name: og_title
fields.label: Opengraph Title
fields.description: Used for social sharing - leave blank to use page title
